creator: eliotfur@gmail.com
text:
I've just installed Apache 2.2.17 + PHP 5.3.6 + MySQL 5.5... Apache steals focus from fullscreen applications every 20 or so minutes...

For example, while watching movies in Media Player Classic, it can go out of fullscreen mode and then it displays a note in its status bar: "Focus lost to: Apache HTTP Server"...

This happens even if Service monitor is not used...

creator: eliotfur@gmail.com
text:
NOT_OUR_BUG

Sorry, this was caused by Apache server restarting itself with error
"child process exited with status 255"
because of php5ts.dll v5.3.6
I replaced it with PHP 5.2.17 and everything seems to work fine now...
